title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; simple chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-model, admin panel, RAG, plugins) packaged as a single Docker image.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing chat, generate, pull, list, delete, and embeddings with fluent builders.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API for chat, generate, and model management.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting, and keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline code completions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU/node selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container for CI pipelines needing local LLM calls.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET community SDK for Ollama supporting chat, generate, embeddings, and streaming via HttpClient.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + LangChain for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package expression for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on NixOS with CUDA or ROCm.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of Modelfile recipes for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-rfcs
summary: Public RFC repo where the Ollama team discusses upcoming features like tool use, multi-modal, clustering.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models in channels or DMs.
